title: Charlier - 36 Advanced Etudes for Trumpet
description:
This is the complete book of 36 Advanced Etudes for Trumpet by Theo Charlier. It is considered the definitive book of etudes for study and performance for the trumpet, and a "must have" for any serious student of the instrument. The cost for this book keeps going up every year, and was about $85 last I checked. (It was $35 back in about 1990 when I bought my edition.)

It is PDF (Acrobat) format, 300 DPI black and white, and ready to print to 8.5 x 11.

It is also my very first torrent, so please forgive if I havn&#039;t done this correctly yet, and rest assured that any problems will be rectified so this book gets shared as intended.
